title: Topological Electropoles in 4+1 Dimensional EYMCS Theory
abstract: A class of explicit exact solutions of Einstein Yang Mills Chern Simons (EYMCS) theory corresponding to topological solitons carrying non-Abelian topological electric charge is obtained. This verifies a conjecture made in Ref.[1,2] regarding the stabilization of the corresponding charged configurations in the theory without gravity .
